column4: Its killing me man I can't figure out how to change KDE fonts in Ubuntu 8.10.  I've tried both System Settings and Qtconfig
Amarok is a the best player though, but the font is killing me
are you running gnome or kde?
It says you need kcontrol installed its not the repository anymore..
it doesn't have the kcontrol package in it
Ok well have you tried configuring it inside of amarok?
yeah but some of the fonts are still big :(
Are you sure you are using the correctly sized fonts?
